text:
CodeCombat (YC W14) | FULL-TIME | ONSITE | San Francisco | Senior Software Engineer

CodeCombat (http://codecombat.com/about) is a programming game for learning to code. We are currently 13 people, funded by a16z and YC, in SF, aiming to level up computer science education both in and out of the classroom. Long term, we are evolving education through game-based learning. We're open source and looking to add a core engineer to our elite engineering team. More details at https://jobs.lever.co/codecombat/18a8182d-938a-4e2a-b2a2-ccf...
